claw.tatsu.primitive

Class Pragma

  • java.lang.Object
    • claw.tatsu.primitive.Pragma

  • public final class Pragma
extends java.lang.Object
    Primitive transformation and test applied to FpragmaStatement. This included: - Extract directive prefix of a FpragmaStatement. - Split long pragma into continued pragma. - Remove comment from a pragma - Find pragma into previous siblings.
    Author:
    clementval

    • Method Detail

      • getPrefix

        public static java.lang.String getPrefix(Xnode pragma)
        Return the pragma prefix.
        Parameters:
        pragma - The pragma node.
        Returns:
        Directive prefix if any. Empty string otherwise.

      • split

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> split(java.lang.String fullPragma,
                                                     int maxColumns,
                                                     java.lang.String pragmaPrefix)
        Split a long pragma into chunk depending on the maxColumns specified. The split is done on spaces or commas.
        Parameters:
        fullPragma - The original full pragma value.
        maxColumns - Maximum number of columns. This length take into account the added prefix and continuation symbol.
        pragmaPrefix - Prefix used by the pragma.
        Returns:
        A list of chunks from the original pragma.

      • splitByLength

        public static void splitByLength(Xnode pragma,
                                 XcodeProgram xcodeml,
                                 java.lang.String prefix)
                          throws IllegalTransformationException
        Split the line by its length and add continuation symbols.
        Parameters:
        pragma - Pragma statement to be splitted.
        xcodeml - The XcodeML on which the transformations are applied.
        prefix - Prefix of the directive.
        Throws:
        IllegalTransformationException - If the given element is not a FpragmaStatement.

      • splitByCont

        public static void splitByCont(Xnode pragma,
                               java.lang.String prefix,
                               XcodeProgram xcodeml)
                        throws IllegalTransformationException
        Split the line by its previous continuation mark.
        Parameters:
        pragma - Pragma node.
        prefix - Pragma prefix.
        xcodeml - Current XcodeML translation unit.
        Throws:
        IllegalTransformationException - If the given element is not a FpragmaStatement.

      • dropEndingComment

        public static java.lang.String dropEndingComment(java.lang.String pragma)
        Remove any trailing comment from a pragma string.
        Parameters:
        pragma - Original pragma string.
        Returns:
        Pragma string without the trailing comment if any.

      • fromClawPrimitive

        public static boolean fromClawPrimitive(Xnode pragma)
        Check if the pragma was already continued. Can happen when using the !$claw primitive directive
        Parameters:
        pragma - Pragma statement to be checked.
        Returns:
        True if the pragma was previously continued.

      • findPrevious

        public static Xnode findPrevious(Xnode from,
                                 java.lang.String keyword)
        Find a pragma element in the previous nodes containing a given keyword.
        Parameters:
        from - Element to start from.
        keyword - Keyword to be found in the pragma.
        Returns:
        The pragma if found. Null otherwise.

      • moveInExecution

        public static void moveInExecution(Xnode pragma)
        If the first pragma statement is located as the first statement of the execution block, the OMNI Compiler front-end places it with the declaration block. If this doesn't make sense for a specific pragma, this method will move it to the execution block.
        Parameters:
        pragma - The pragma to be moved.
